summary:
Till Holmes as I could see by his eager face and peering eyes, very many
 other things were to be read upon the trampled grass. Lestrade showed us the exact spot at which the body had been found, and indeed so moist
 was the ground that I could plainly see the traces which had been left by the fall of
 the stricken man.
